item.title: Hewlett Packard boss cites ‘fiduciary duty’ to pursue lawsuit against Mike Lynch’s estate after yacht drowning - New York Post

  5. Sicily Yacht Sinking: Why $4 Billion Lawsuit Against Mike Lynch Is Moving Forward After His Death  E! NEWS

item.title: Private sector job growth cools to 99,000 in August, well below estimate: ADP - Fox Business
item.description:
